body_html:
I have the same problem:

  • OS: Mac OS
  • PyTorch version: 0.3.0
  • How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source): conda
  • Python version: Python 3.6.4
  • CUDA/cuDNN version: None

~/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/init.py in ()
54 except ImportError:
55 pass
---> 56 from torch._C import *
57
58 all += [name for name in dir(_C)

ImportError: dlopen(~/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/_C.cpython-36m-darwin.so, 9): Library not loaded: @rpath/libiomp5.dylib
Referenced from: ~/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/lib/libTH.1.dylib
Reason: image not found

I have updated Anaconda3 and reinstalled it, which did not work.

body:
I have the same problem:
- OS: Mac OS
- PyTorch version: 0.3.0
- How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source): conda
- Python version: Python 3.6.4
- CUDA/cuDNN version: None

~/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/__init__.py in <module>()
     54 except ImportError:
     55     pass
---> 56 from torch._C import *
     57 
     58 __all__ += [name for name in dir(_C)

ImportError: dlopen(~/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/_C.cpython-36m-darwin.so, 9): Library not loaded: @rpath/libiomp5.dylib
  Referenced from: ~/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/lib/libTH.1.dylib
  Reason: image not found

I have updated Anaconda3 and reinstalled it, which did not work.
